timeline.headline: Linked Data related projects at NIRAS
timeline.text: We are applying the technology both internally and in client projects.

date.headline: WeBIM
date.text: Web-BIM platform for providing engineers with insights.

asset.caption: Room history allows you to see how the layout has changed over time

date.headline: Aarhus University Digital Twin
date.text: Semantic data model of campus, buildings, spaces, sensors and mechanical system.

date.headline: ScienceCity Lyngby
date.text:
Democratic access to data. I provide my data and we can all use and analyze a common dataset.

Querying over various data sources using Comunica

date.headline: BART
date.text:
Track A: Building Solibri rule sets for checking danish building regulations

Track B: Investigating new methods (including Linked Data)

date.headline: Almen Byggeportal
date.text:
Digital project delivery for all subsidized residential buildings in Denmark

- Examination declarations
- Document and model checking
- Building element documentation (Material passports, O&M material etc.)
